definition: to let sth slip by/to miss an opportunity
surname Zuo
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]
to lose/to miss/to fail
to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance
to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance

sentences.english: This is an opportunity that should not be missed.
Please make up your mind / make your decision as early as possible / you can, or you’ll miss the good / golden chance / opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 请尽早做出决定，不然你会坐失良机。

sentences.english: One of the biggest mistakes in one´s life is to miss the boat.
sentences.chinese: 人生最大的错误之一就是坐失良机。

sentences.english: So, get yourself prepared, and don't miss the boat .
sentences.chinese: 因此，你得好好准备，可不要坐失良机。

sentences.english: He cannot but let the chance slip through his fingers when offered a good job.
sentences.chinese: 尽管有人提供了一份好工作，但他只好坐失良机。

sentences.english: you will lose your chance if you delay your action.
sentences.chinese: 如果迟迟不采取行动，你就会坐失良机。

sentences.english: I'm sure your company won't miss the chance.
sentences.chinese: 我敢打赌，贵公司不会坐失良机的。

sentences.english: Faced with a major opportunity for scientific and technological revolution, can not let slip a golden opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 面对科技革命的重大机遇，不能坐失良机。

sentences.english: Since you are not sure of a minute, throw not away an hour.
sentences.chinese: 既然你不能把握一分钟，就不应坐失一小时。

sentences.english: We've missed the bus. Our competitors have captured the market.
sentences.chinese: 我们已坐失良机，我们的竞争对手已占领了市场。

definition: to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance
to advance prematurely
to fail within sight of success (idiom); last-minute failure/to fall at the last hurdle/snatching defeat from the jaws of victory
Time that has passed will never come back. (idiom)
to affect adversely/to delay or hinder/to waste (an opportunity)/to mislead
to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
extremely rare (idiom)/once in a blue moon
see 苟且偷安[gou3 qie3 tou1 an1]
Opportunity knocks but once. (idiom)
pinyin: ji1 bu4 ke3 shi1 , shi2 bu4 zai4 lai2

definition: (idiom) to hesitate/to remain undecided
to sit and waste a good opportunity (idiom); to lose the chance
to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
too late for regrets (idiom); It is useless to repent after the event.
to sit and await success or failure (idiom); to wait to see the outcome of a fight before taking sides/to sit on the fence
confidential aspects of a matter/secrets/key moment for action
